progress: Dirty working copy detected and committed, use `jj diff -r vsxzxokysznn` to see the changes.

Modified `.claude/harness/ralph/run` to capture commit hashes before/after the main loop and compute diff stats. Added `compute_diff_stats` method that parses `jj diff --stat` output to extract lines_added and lines_deleted. Added four new fields to stats.jsonl record: commit_start, commit_end, lines_added, and lines_deleted. All fields default to sensible values (null/0) when commits are identical or invalid. Ruby syntax validated successfully. All acceptance criteria met.
